pullrequest.title: Model submission for X4 sensor config 2

content.raw: I am fine with that.  As far as the sensors go, they behave pretty similarly.  We experimented with using the sonar from hector\_quadrotor under gazebo 9, but haven’t found an equivalent way of operating under ignition gazebo.  Is the lidar lite V3 sensor model complete in ignition?  I see something called GPU Lidar in the list you sent.  Is that what is used by the lidar lite?
content.html: I am fine with that. As far as the sensors go, they behave pretty similarly. We experimented with using the sonar from hector_quadrotor under gazebo 9, but haven’t found an equivalent way of operating under ignition gazebo. Is the lidar lite V3 sensor model complete in ignition? I see something called GPU Lidar in the list you sent. Is that what is used by the lidar lite?
